title: Did Our Listener Ever Reconnect With Her Ex From High School?
description:
Earlier this year, our listener Jill reached out looking for closure from her high school sweetheart. He broke up with her right before college without an explanation. After we reached out to him for answers, she was not happy with his response. BUT he did offer to take her out for her birthday. So what happened since we last spoke to her?
